title: Force applied to blocks to accelerate all three

content.question: Three blocks, A, B, and C, of masses 1, 2, and 3 kg, respectively, are initially at rest on a frictionless surface as indicated in the figure above. What force F has to be applied on block C to accelerate the three blocks at 2 m/s2 ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
